entry.title: Mat Clean Concentrate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Mat Clean
Price: 58.00

The Mat Clean Concentrate is a mix of natural cleansing and disinfecting ingredients that keep yoga mats and props free of germs and bacteria. Our biodegradable concentrate is free of parabens and toxins. 1 bottle of concentrate is equal to 4L of cleaner when mixed, making for an eco-friendly option! 

Concentrate is 1:8 ratio (500ml concentrate = 4L mat cleaner; 125ml concentrate = 1L mat cleaner). Mix concentrate with (distilled) water to create mat cleaner formulation.


FEATURES

  • Blend of essential oils and natural scents

  • Biodegradable

  • Non-toxic

  • Paraben-free

  • Comes in a non-toxic, recycled bottle


SPECS

  • Volume: 500 ml 

  • Ingredients: Witch Hazel Distillate, Purified Water, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Peppermint essential oil, Lavender essential oil, Eucalyptus essential oil, Rosemary essential oil, Cajeput essential oil, Vetiver essential oil, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate

  • Made in Vancouver, BC, Canada


HOW TO USE

  • Concentrate is 1:8 ratio (500ml concentrate = 4L mat cleaner; 125ml concentrate = 1L mat cleaner). 

  • Mix concentrate with (distilled) water to create a mat cleaner formulation

  • Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe

  • Allow the mat to dry fully before rolling

entry.title: Mighty Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Classic Yoga Mats
Price: 86.00

Our Mighty Mat is back! By popular demand this sticky, durable and comfortable mat has been added back to the Halfmoon Mat lineup. A great mat for any style of yoga, the 4mm thick Mighty Mat is a great mat for your self-practice or your studio practice.

TIP: Clean your mat thoroughly before use to enhance traction and ease of use. 


FEATURES

  • Durable and comfortable

  • Sticky for traction and stability

  • Traction improves with washing and use

  • Easy to clean

  • Great for any style yoga

  • Performs well even with sweat

  • Pairs with our Wet Grip Towel or Gripster Towel for enhanced grip! 


SPECS

  • 72" x 24" (183cm x 61cm)

  • 4 mm thick 

  • Made of non-toxic PVC (6P Free)

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Due to a finish on the mat used to avoid it sticking to itself while packaged, we recommend you clean the mat before using for optimal performance. Repeat as needed

  • Spray with water or our Mat Cleanser (or gentle cleaning product) and wipe with a sponge or cloth

  • Hang or lay flat to air dry

entry.title: Deluxe Studio Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Classic Yoga Mats
Price: 50.00

Our Deluxe Studio Mat is 6mm thick for an extra soft, comfortable, and gentle practice surface. Designed to provide yogis with generous cushioning for daily asana, the Deluxe Studio Mat is suitable for all styles and all levels of yoga, pilates, and conditioning, even when layered on hardwood or concrete floors.

The waffled surface is ideal for anything from gentle hatha yoga to an energetic vinyasa practice. Lightweight, easy to clean, and durable, this mat is perfect for daily use.


FEATURES

  • 6mm of cushioning

  • Latex-free

  • Moderate grip and durable

  • Easy to clean

  • Non-toxic PVC (6p free)


SPECS

  • 24" x 72" (61 cm x 183 cm)

  • 3.3 lbs (1.5 kg)

  • 6mm (1/4 inch) thick

  • 100% non-toxic PVC (6P-free)

  • Made in Taiwan 


PRODUCT CARE

  • Before using your mat for the first time, clean it thoroughly, then repeat as needed

  • Spray with water or our Mat Cleanser and wipe with a sponge or cloth

  • Hang or lay flat to air dry before storage


NOTES

  • To increase grip, give the mat a salt scrub with coarse salt, let sit, then wipe off with a damp cloth

  • Whenever you're done cleaning your mat, always lay flat or hang it to dry

  • Practice on the mat with the Halfmoon logo facing up
